name: Tech_Eden
description:
A First Person Platforming Game, where you play as a deactivated robot that awakes at a  lab 100 years into the future, to find that it's overgrown and flooded in some areas. Make your way out by traversing levels by experimenting with technology that has been left behind by previous inhabitants. 

 [32 hr Game Jam]  Created by a Team of 6.
